pages.text: Ni far them imams direkt en accordance kun our commandments ni instru them kiel work righteousness kiel observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat)! Al us ili devoted worshipers
As por Lot ni granted him wisdom knowledge ni sav him el community ke practiced abomen; ili est wicked evil popol
Ni admitted him our mercy li est righteous
antaux ke, Noah vok ni respond him. Ni sav him his famili el great disaster
Ni supported him popol rejected our revelations. Ili est evil popol ni dron them all
David Solomon when ili once regul regard someone's crop ke detru another's sxaf ni witnessed their judgment
Ni granted Solomon gxust kompren ni dot ambaux them kun wisdom knowledge. Ni committed mont dejxor David glor (Di) tro bird! This est ki ni did
Ni instru him skill far sxild protekt vi en milit! Est vi tiam thankful
Solomon ni committed vent gusting blov his disposal. Li direct gxi as li wished whatever land li chose ni ben such land him. Ni est fully aware da all ajx
